info.author: Zhenfei Yuan, Taizhong Hu
info.description:
This package provides probability routines for four kinds of common
        seen positive count random variables,
        
          o Poisson
        
          o Generalized Poisson
        
          o Zero Inflated Generalized Possion
        
          o Negative Binomial Distribution 
        
        also implement the algo for sampling multivariate count variables with
        pre-specified correlation matrix based on the sampling algo of regular
        vine copulas which is implemented in the package pyvine.
info.keywords: count random variables, multivariate, correlation matrix, vine copulas, pyvine
info.name: countvar
info.summary: Sample algorithms for four kinds of univariate distributions,                  Poisson, Generalized Poisson, Zero Inflated Generalized Possion                 and Negative Binomial Distribution.
info.html_description:
This package provides probability routines for four kinds of common

seen positive count random variables,

o Poisson

o Generalized Poisson

o Zero Inflated Generalized Possion

o Negative Binomial Distribution

also implement the algo for sampling multivariate count variables with pre-specified correlation matrix based on the sampling algo of regular vine copulas which is implemented in the package pyvine.
